topic.title: Hospital Admission Diagnosis Section - conformance rules

section.p: The Hospital Admitting Diagnosis section contains a narrative description of the primary reason for admission to a hospital facility. The section includes an optional entry to record patient conditions.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="46241-6" HOSPITAL ADMISSION DX (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] hospitalAdmissionDiagnosis (CONF:9934, CONF:9935)
